name: Radrover Snap!!
description:
RAD ROVER: GO!!

You are the raddest rover on Mars! Your mission: take the best pictures of all the strange wildlife that has suddenly appeared there. But beware, taking too many pictures drains your power! When your power runs out, select the best shots of each creature to get the best score. (Bonus points for selfies!) Let humanity know what awaits them on Mars!

Note: in the web build, you may have to click inside the window to enable input.

Controls:

Gamepad recommended! (but mouse works too):

  • Take picture: A button / left click
  • Speed up: hold B button / right click

  • Selfie mode: X button / V key

  • Sing happy birthday to yourself (drains power): hold Y button / F key
TEAM: @edriscoll - programmin n stuff @emarcotte - programmin n stuff @roushey - art n stuff @adhesion - music n stuff
